Document.Title: VB Code: The "Are You Sure?" Message Box During Form_Unload

Content:
Private Sub Form_Unload(Cancel As Integer)
        '
        'This sub makes sure the user really wants to quit.
        'Note the use of the ProductName Property
        'of the App object of the VB Library.
        '
        Cancel = (VBA.MsgBox("Are you sure you want " _
            & "to quit?",  vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2 + _
            vbQuestion, VB.App.ProductName) = vbNo)
    End Sub
